fighterA.name: brown field mouse
fighterA.description: a sun-drenched meadow dotted with wildflowers, bordering a dense patch of thorny bushes. wildflowers smooth river stone thorny bush small pile of acorns brown field mouse (fighter) peaceful and serene, with an underlying sense of cautious vigilance. the mouse clutches a tiny, sharpened twig â€“ is it a weapon or a tool? a shadow flickers at the edge of the meadow, unseen.

battleLog.attackCommentary: A single TINY strike from the unlikely contender lands! The crowd gasps as a measly one point of damage registers on Godzilla in Round 1 - can this mousey underdog.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The tiny titan faces a WALL of atomic fury as Squeaky attempts a daring sidestep. Can this masterful Mouse maneuver out of Godzilla's immediate reach and set their own counter-offensive.
battleLog.randomEvent: brown field mouse narrowly dodges Godzilla's attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: The mighty Godzilla opens round two with a PLANETARY SHELVOLT! The poor brown field mouse is caught squarely in the atomic blast, taking a staggering 201 damage and leaving their.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Round 2's tension explodes as the tiny titan, a whirlwind of brown fur,  dodges each atomic blast with lightning reflexes. It's a test of ultimate speed and Godzilla will.
battleLog.randomEvent: Godzilla uses undefined to enhance their attack!
